mapper.select: SELECT room_Total - ( SELECT COUNT (res_NO) FROM ( SELECT res_NO FROM PET_ROOM_RESERVATION WHERE res_FirstDate between #{res_FirstDate} and #{res_LastDate} or res_LastDate between #{res_FirstDate} and #{res_LastDate} or #{res_FirstDate} between res_FirstDate and res_LastDate or #{res_LastDate} between res_FirstDate and res_LastDate)) as "NUM" FROM PET_ROOM WHERE room_NO = #{room_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET_ROOM ( ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IMG, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_NUM, ROOM_TOTAL) VALUES (#{room_NO},#{room_Name},#{room_IMG},#{room_Detail}, #{room_Price},#{room_NUM},#{room_Total})
